work.name: HCESC @ UIUC
work.summary: Augmented reality clinical breast examination trainer using Arduino, force sensing array, and Unity

awards.title: Promise of Excellence Fellowship
awards.summary: Given to incoming students who demonstrate the potential to achieve great things in the field of Electrical and Computer Engineering.

projects.name: Superscalar, Out-of-Order RISC-V CPU
projects.summary: Built a 2-way superscalar Out-Of-Order RISC-V CPU using explicit register renaming supporting RISC-V(IM) ISA. Features include Dadda multiplier, Synopsis IP divider, BTB & BHT/GShare tournament branch predictor, 4-way set-associative PLRU pipelined caches with next-line prefetcher. Verified design using random coverage, Synopsys VCS and Verdi, Spike.

projects.name: 32-bit RISC-V Datapath Layout
projects.summary: Hand laid out a bit-sliced RISC-V Datapath, starting from basic cells (NAND,NOR,DFF,etc.), progressing to ALU, register file, shifter, etc., and finally to the full datapath.
